AT.name: Mad Dog McCree™
AT.description: Nur ein Revolverheld kann einen durchgedrehten Mad Dog aufhalten… und das sind Sie, Partner. Wenn der rücksichtslose Bandit Mad Dog McCree mit seiner Bande gesuchter Ausbrecher randaliert, lassen sie eine Spur der Verwüstung zurück. Mad Dog McCree und seine Mörderbande sind in die Stadt geritten, haben den Bürgermeister und seine Tochter entführt und sie in ihr Versteck verschleppt. Diese Hombres sind bösartig und gemein. Was diese Stadt braucht, ist ein Revolverheld, der ein bisschen Blei in Richtung der Gefahr verteilt. Erleben Sie von Neuem die Schießpulver-Herrlichkeit des Wilden Westens mit dem Spielhallen-Klassiker Mad Dog McCree von American Laser Games!

AU.name: Mad Dog McCree™
AU.description: Only one gunslinger can stop a Mad Dog gone wild... and that's you, partner. When the ruthless outlaw Mad Dog McCree goes on a rampage with a nasty pack of wanted fugitives, they leave death in their wake. Mad Dog McCree and his band of cutthroats have ridden into town, kidnapped the Mayor and his daughter, and taken them to his hideout. These hombres are mean and vicious. What this town needs is a gunslinger to spray a little lead in harm's way. Relive the gunpowder glory of the Wild West with American Laser Games arcade classic Mad Dog McCree!

BG.name: Mad Dog McCree™
BG.description: Only one gunslinger can stop a Mad Dog gone wild... and that's you, partner. When the ruthless outlaw Mad Dog McCree goes on a rampage with a nasty pack of wanted fugitives, they leave death in their wake. Mad Dog McCree and his band of cutthroats have ridden into town, kidnapped the Mayor and his daughter, and taken them to his hideout. These hombres are mean and vicious. What this town needs is a gunslinger to spray a little lead in harm's way. Relive the gunpowder glory of the Wild West with American Laser Games arcade classic Mad Dog McCree!

BE.name: Mad Dog McCree™
BE.description: Un seul flingueur peut arrêter un Chien Enragé déchaîné... et c'est vous, partenaire. Lorsque l'impitoyable hors-la-loi Mad Dog McCree se livre à des actes de violence avec un groupe teigneux de fugitifs recherchés, ils laissent un sillage de mort derrière eux. Mad Dog McCree et sa bande de meurtriers se sont rendus en ville, ont enlevé le Maire et sa fille, et les ont emmenés dans son repaire. Ces hombres sont méchants et vicieux. Ce dont cette ville a besoin est d'un flingueur pour prendre un peu les devants sur la voie du danger. Revivez la gloire de la poudre à canon du Far West avec le jeu d'arcade classique d'American Laser Games, Mad Dog McCree !

ES.name: Mad Dog McCree™
ES.description: Solamente un pistolero puede detener a Mad Dog vuelto loco….y ese, es usted amigo. Cuando el implacable bandido va alborotado con su pandilla de fugitivos, dejan la muerte a su paso. Mad Dog McCree y su banda de asesinos han llegado a la ciudad, han arrestado al alcalde y a su hija y los han llevado a su guarida. Estos hombres son malos y crueles. Lo que esta ciudad necesita es un pistolero con lo que hay que tener para hacerles frente. ¡Libera la pólvora de la gloria del salvaje Oeste con este clásico modo arcade de American Laser Games llamado Mad Dog McCree!

IT.name: Mad Dog McCree™
IT.description: Solo un pistolero può fermare un cane selvaggio impazzito... e sei tu, amico. Quando lo spietato fuorilegge Mad Dog McCree e la sua banda di ricercati si scatenano, una scia di morte si forma alle loro spalle. Mad Dog McCree e la sua banda di tagliagole sono arrivati in città, hanno rapito il sindaco e sua figlia e li hanno portati via con sé. Questi hombre sono viscidi e crudeli. Quello che serve a questa città è un pistolero capace di mettere loro un po' di sale sulla coda. Rivivi le glorie infuocate del Selvaggio West con il classico arcade Mad Dog McCree firmato American Laser Games!

NL.name: Mad Dog McCree™
NL.description: Slechts één revolverheld kan een losgeslagen Mad Dog stoppen... en dat ben jij, partner. Wanneer de meedogenloze bandiet Mad Dog McCree op rooftocht gaat met een gemene groep van gezochte voortvluchtigen, laten ze een spoor van dood en verderf achter. Mad Dog McCree en zijn bende moordenaars zijn naar de stad gereden en hebben de burgemeester en zijn dochter ontvoerd naar hun schuilplaats. Deze hombres zijn gemeen en wreed. Wat deze stad nodig heeft is een revolverheld om een beetje lood in het gespuis te pompen. Herbeleef revolverglorie van het Wilde Westen met de Amerikaanse Laser Games Arcade Klassieker Mad Dog McCree!

NZ.name: Mad Dog McCree™
NZ.description: Only one gunslinger can stop a Mad Dog gone wild... and that's you, partner. When the ruthless outlaw Mad Dog McCree goes on a rampage with a nasty pack of wanted fugitives, they leave death in their wake. Mad Dog McCree and his band of cutthroats have ridden into town, kidnapped the Mayor and his daughter, and taken them to his hideout. These hombres are mean and vicious. What this town needs is a gunslinger to spray a little lead in harm's way. Relive the gunpowder glory of the Wild West with American Laser Games arcade classic Mad Dog McCree!

PL.name: Mad Dog McCree™
PL.description: Only one gunslinger can stop a Mad Dog gone wild... and that's you, partner. When the ruthless outlaw Mad Dog McCree goes on a rampage with a nasty pack of wanted fugitives, they leave death in their wake. Mad Dog McCree and his band of cutthroats have ridden into town, kidnapped the Mayor and his daughter, and taken them to his hideout. These hombres are mean and vicious. What this town needs is a gunslinger to spray a little lead in harm's way. Relive the gunpowder glory of the Wild West with American Laser Games arcade classic Mad Dog McCree!

PT.name: Mad Dog McCree™
PT.description: Apenas um pistoleiro pode parar um Mad Dog selvagem… és tu, parceiro. Quando o cruel fora da lei Mad Dog McCree parte numa onda de violência com um perigoso grupo de fugitivos, deixam um rasto de morte. Mad Dog McCree e o seu bando de bárbaros foram à cidade, raptaram o Mayor e a sua filha e levaram-nos para um esconderijo. Estes "hombres" são maus e perigosos. Esta cidade precisa de um pistoleiro para espalhar um pouco de chumbo contra o mal. Liberta a glória da pólvora do Oeste Selvagem com o Clássico de Arcada da American Laser Games, Mad Dog McCree!

RU.name: Mad Dog McCree™
RU.description: Только один стрелок может остановить остервеневшего Бешеного Пса... и этот стрелок — ты, приятель. Когда беспощадный преступник Бешеный Пёс МакКри выходит на охоту с шайкой беглых бандитов, они истребляют все на своем пути. Бешеный Пёс МакКри и его банда головорезов заехали в город, похитили мэра и его дочь и спрятали их в своём укрытии. Эти парни подлые и жестокие. То, что этому городу нужно — это стрелок, который нафарширует пустые бандитские головы свинцом. Вдохните пропахший порохом воздух Дикого Запада в классической аркаде Mad Dog McCree от American Laser Games.
